Bash(.venv/Scripts/python.exe -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect(''estimates.db'')
cursor = conn.cursor()
cursor.execute(''SELECT * FROM standard_assemblies WHERE name LIKE ""%AB_PF755TS%"" OR name LIKE ""%PF755TS%"" LIMIT 5'')
assemblies = cursor.fetchall()
cursor.execute(''PRAGMA table_info(standard_assemblies)'')
columns = cursor.fetchall()
print(''Standard Assemblies Columns:'')
for col in columns:
    print(f''  {col[1]} ({col[2]})'')
print(''\nExisting PF755TS Assemblies:'')
for assembly in assemblies:
    print(f''  ID: {assembly[0]}, Name: {assembly[1]}, Category: {assembly[3]}'')
conn.close()
")

")
